GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.4.212
GSD.description:
s390: fix double free of GS and RI CBs on fork() failure

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.212 by commit cacd522e6652fbc2dc0cc6ae11c4e30782fef14b, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit 8d9047f8b967ce6181fd824ae922978e1b055cc0. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: s390: fix double free of GS and RI CBs on fork() failure
